titleText: Microsoft opens up testing of Azure Data Box, its Amazon Snowball rival
mainText: Microsoft is accepting testers into a preview program for its Azure Data Box data-transfer appliance. Azure Data Box weighs 45 pounds and is ruggedized, tamper resistant and manageable, according to the company's announcement about the preview.

titleText: How Microsoft built the worldâ€™s most powerful game console
mainText: When designer Bryan Sparks explains the inspiration for the look and feel of the modern Xbox, he says he and his team went back to 1968, when a certain landmark Stanley Kubrick film hit theaters.

titleText: The Amazing Ways Microsoft Uses AI To Drive Business Success
mainText: The adoption of AI in business and society is being spurred on by tech giants with resources to design, build and roll out services affordable and simple enough for everyday use. Microsoft is one of.
